title: OIDC code flow access tokens in JWT format verified via UserInfo can not be refreshed
body:
### Describe the bug

Currently ID tokens will be refreshed alongside code flow access tokens when ID token is nearly expired.
However if the ID token is still valid but the access token is not, then, such an access token will only be refreshed if it is binary, if it is in JWT format - then the expectation it must be verified locally - and if no verification keys are available the verification will fail, not reaching the token refreshment phase.
